title: Championship Chests?
body: Bought 20 chests to try to get more hextech shards but I didn't even get 1. Are they disabled?

replies.body: He's stating he wants hextech shards. and rng did not favor him. Not the championship shards but hextech. Would like to know if they are not available inside of championship chests.
I took a look at your account and it looks like you received champion/skin shards with every chest you opened. Can you clarify the issue you're having?

I've opened over 30 chests and I still haven't found any void crystals to make hextech annie (or the vayne skin since I have Annies). It seems very unusual and its only since the championship start. Is it still possible?

Ah, you mean gemstones or *gems*. You can still find them in Hextech Chests during the Championship, they're just a pretty rare drop overall. The Championship has not modified the droprate of these in any way, and it sounds like you just haven't had much luck finding them lately.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details on the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
